knimeNode.name: Active Branch Inverter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Inverts status of a branch: inactive becomes active and vice versa.

fullDescription.intro: Inverts status of a branch: inactive becomes active and vice versa. This is useful in conjunction with "Try"/"Catch" nodes when certain workflow branches (usually the "fail" branch) should only be executed when the main workflow branch ran into an error.

ports.outPort: A flow variable port. It will be active only if the input is inactive.
